submission.individual-reflection: During this exercize I became familliar with semantics of XPath. After working in the group I found different interesting functions and ways to use them in XPath expresiion. Feedback was a bit helpful but overall my solution was fine. I hope my feedback helps my teammates. I didn't improve my solution because everything was alright. The topic of XPath actually was quite useful as I have already encountered XPath when was learning more about web development. I don't have any ideas, everything is quite helpful already.
